head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths SERKEY, RENEE J.,

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths SERKEY, RENEE J.,

block.p: SERKEY--Renee J., June 18, 2007. Much beloved father of Robert and Richard; fatherin-law of Pauline and Louise; grandfather of Ethan, Rebecca, and Jakub; uncle of Peter, Deirdre, Tony, and Anglea. He will live in our hearts forever. Service Sunday, June 24, 1pm at ''Schwartz Bros.'' (Queens Blvd and 76th Rd), Forest Hills, NY.

SERKEY--Renee J., June 18, 2007. Much beloved father of Robert and Richard; fatherin-law of Pauline and Louise; grandfather of Ethan, Rebecca, and Jakub; uncle of Peter, Deirdre, Tony, and Anglea. He will live in our hearts forever. Service Sunday, June 24, 1pm at ''Schwartz Bros.'' (Queens Blvd and 76th Rd), Forest Hills, NY.
